title: So can someone explain to me why Soraka top is unacceptable but funneling lulu/taric isnt?
body:
Hello. I want to preface this by saying i absolutely despise the funneling playstyle of "0 farm/lane interaction, just play safe and poke non-stop".

But this has been actively encouraged by Riot for years now. So why is Soraka top outrageous when Lulu, Taric and Leona have been allowed (and encouraged) to do this for several years already? How is this any different?

This really isn't a problem with Soraka, or any of the other supports being picked. It's a problem with the role itself, allowing them to play like this and still find success.
